alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 22 at 2:06PM CDT until April 23 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 5 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may damage trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. The strong winds are also likely to kick up areas of blowing dust, causing varying degrees of reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some of the strongest winds Friday will not develop until after dark, just ahead of an approaching cold front. While winds will be strong in the afternoon, a surge in winds just ahead of the cold front is expected during the evening through overnight hours.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
